import React from 'react' import { Dialog, Button, DialogActions, DialogContent, DialogTitle, Grid, TextField, } from '@material-ui/core' import accounting from '../../funcs/accounting' export default function AddBudgetDialog(props) { const [state, setState] = React.useState() const handleChange = (e) => { setState({...state, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}) } const handleConfirm = () => { let { budgets, success} = accounting.addBudget(state.name) } return (
Add your budget Select working days
) }
